verses.verse: Let <S%G3049><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3049>account<s%> of <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> of <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
Here <S%G3063><s%>, moreover, <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G2212>required<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3623>stewards<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1519>it<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a very small <S%G1646>thing<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I should be <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G442>man<s%>'s <S%G2250>judgment<s%>: <S%G235>yea<s%>, I <S%G350>judge<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> mine own <S%G1683>self<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G4894>know<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> against <S%G1683>myself<s%>; <S%G235>yet<s%> am <S%G1344>I<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> hereby5129, 1722 <S%G1344>justified<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G350>judgeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> judge2919, Acts0 <S%G3361>nothing<s%> before4253, Leviticus2 the <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G2532>both<s%> bring to <S%G5461>light<s%> the hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> make <S%G5319>manifest<s%> the <S%G1012>counsels<s%> of the <S%G2588>hearts<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1096>shall<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1096>have<s%> his <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, I have in a figure <S%G3345>transferred<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> ye might <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G5426>go<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you be puffed <S%G5448>up<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G2087>other<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1252>maketh<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> to <S%G1252>differ<s%>? <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> hast <S%G2192>thou<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2192>thou<s%> <S%G2983>didst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%>? but if1487, 2532 thou didst <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5101>it<s%>, why dost thou <S%G2744>glory<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> thou <S%G2983>hadst<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> received <S%G2983>it<s%>?

Already <S%G2235><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G2880>filled<s%>, <S%G2235>already<s%> ye are become <S%G4147>rich<s%>, ye have come to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: yea <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3785>would<s%> <S%G1065>that<s%> ye did <S%G936>reign<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> might <S%G4821>reign<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%>, I <S%G1380>think<s%>, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath set <S%G584>forth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> of <S%G5613>all<s%>, as men doomed to <S%G1935>death<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> unto the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>.

We <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G3474>fools<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s sake, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G772>weak<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G2478>strong<s%>; <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G1741>glory<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G820>dishonor<s%>.

Even <S%G891>unto<s%> this <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3983>we<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3983>hunger<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1372>thirst<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1130>naked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G2852>buffeted<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have no certain <S%G790>dwelling-place<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2872>toil<s%>, <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>: being <S%G3058>reviled<s%>, we <S%G2127>bless<s%>; being <S%G1377>persecuted<s%>, we <S%G430>endure<s%>;

being <S%G987>defamed<s%>, we <S%G3870>entreat<s%>: we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4027>filth<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, the <S%G4067>offscouring<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%>, even <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%>.

I <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to <S%G1788>shame<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> you <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> ten <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3807>tutors<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> have ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begat<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.
I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, be <S%G1096>ye<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of <S%G3450>me<s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G363>put<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> in <S%G363>remembrance<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> I <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, as <S%G5613>though<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%> <S%G2064>were<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1097>know<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of them <S%G3588>that<s%> are puffed <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309>ye<s%>? shall I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>gentleness<s%>?
